comments.text: Perfect spot to get in every direction
next to roundabout,bus stop and a petrol station....best spot to Kampala/west uganda/DRC. I got a ride  to kla in 15min

Not the best spot because of all the taxis.
A truck took us, had so pay money to the policeman in the next city so we could move on.So hitchhiking trucks in uganda is not the best option.
